documentation.title: Detect incorrect use of the `ini_set()` function.
documentation.standard: Using ini_set() for alternating PHP settings, as well as other functions with ability to change configuration at runtime of your scripts is discouraged. Changing runtime configuration might break other plugins and themes.

code.title: Valid: ini_set() for a possibly breaking setting.
Invalid: ini_set() for a possibly breaking setting.

documentation.standard: For some configuration values there are WordPress functions. These are preferred.

code.title: Invalid: ini_set() to alter memory limits.
